com.gsma.mobileconnect.r2
Class MobileConnect

java.lang.Object
  com.gsma.mobileconnect.r2.MobileConnect

public final class MobileConnect
extends java.lang.Object

Convenience methods to construct and access the core public interfaces of MobileConnect.

A default instance can be created via build(MobileConnectConfig). Limited customisation is possible via the builder(MobileConnectConfig) method. Otherwise full customisation can be achieved via the individual builders provided by each of the interfaces.

For those who wish only to work with the MobileConnectInterface, this can be reached via buildInterface(MobileConnectConfig).

Since:
2.0
See Also:
MobileConnectConfig, MobileConnectInterface, IDiscoveryService, IAuthenticationService, IIdentityService
